name: A-RUUUN
description:
My first Game with Unity: A-RUUUN - Jump and Run above the World - find a way out of the universe with portals  

I hope you have fun!

Credits:

  • Made by N.H. Studios
  • Music from YouTubeAudioLibary
  • Textures from CC0 Textures

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space for   jumping
  • Ctrl for sliding
  • left click to shoot the Grappling Gun
